name: Glogou
overview:
Glogou Inc is a leader in Cloud Based Big Data Business Intelligence Solutions. It provides technology solutions and services in helping a business to explore international markets and do EFFECTIVE international marketing and advertisement. One of its focus areas is to help world-wide business to do market research and advertising in China and in Asia with optimized results.

The company develops the world 1st English Interface for Baidu Advertisement platforms (Endu, http://www.glogou.com/adbaidu), Web Accessibility & Visibility Evaluator (WAVE, http://www.glogou.cn).

Glogou applies advanced Digital Signal Processing(DSP) technologies originally developed in Stanford University Electrical Engineering department to advertising and market research. Those technologies can often improve the accuracy of market research and the effectiveness of advertisement very significantly.
